# ggepi

[![Travis-CI Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/lwjohnst86/ggepi.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/lwjohnst86/ggepi)

The goal of ggepi is to provide the tools to easily visualize commonly performed
analyses in (chronic disease) epidemiology.
